about_the_game:
Nothing invokes the sense of battle better than huge, tribal, epic drums. Since the earliest days mankind has used drums to invoke the wrath of the Gods, for communion with higher spirits, and to instill fear in the hearts of the enemy.

Bittersweet Entertainment brings you Cinematic Drums, a fantastic mix of battle ready thunderous themes, ethnic performances, modern EDM and techno hybrid beats, all the epic, bold, and battle ready rhythmic beats your games and battles need.

Track list:
1- Ancient Method
2- Beast Drum
3- Crucial Tom
4- Death Rate
5- Drumland
6- Electric Desk
7- Epic Taiko
8- Filmbeat
9- Filmbeat 2
10- Filmbeat 3
11- Filmbeat 4
12- Gold Tower
13- Goliath
14- Goliath 2
15- Horror Effect
16- Huge Impact
17- Impressive Hit
18- Machine's Drum
19- Metal Bell
20- Metal Bomb
21- Metalman
22- Metalman 2
23- More Than Now
24- Old Kit
25- Poison Drum
26- Ring of Power
27- Rolling Cake
28- Short Tom

Features:
  • 28 BGM themes
  • Composed with high quality drums and percussion
  • .M4A, and .OGG formats included
  • Tested in and formatted for use in RPG Maker MV

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Cinematic Drums

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Cinematic Drums

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: A fantastic mix of battle ready thunderous themes, ethnic performances, modern EDM and techno hybrid beats, all the epic, bold, and battle ready rhythmic beats your games and battles need.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
